---
title: Template Overview
description: Understanding and working with Backstage software templates
---

# Template Overview

Backstage templates enable standardized project creation with pre-configured structures, tools, and best practices.

## What are Templates?

Templates are blueprints for creating new projects that follow your organization's standards. They include:

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card title="Project Structure" icon="folder">
    Consistent directory layouts and file organization
  </Card>
  <Card title="Configuration" icon="settings">
    Pre-configured build tools, linters, and CI/CD
  </Card>
  <Card title="Documentation" icon="book">
    Project READMEs, API docs, and guides
  </Card>
  <Card title="Integration" icon="plug">
    GitHub workflows, monitoring, and deployment configs
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## Golden Path Todo Template

The included **Golden Path Fullstack Todo** template creates a production-ready fullstack application with:

### Technology Stack

- **Frontend**: React 18 + Vite + Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js + Express + MongoDB
- **Testing**: Jest + Cypress
- **Deployment**: Docker + AWS CloudFormation
- **Documentation**: Mintlify integration

### Generated Structure

```
my-todo-app/
├── IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md      # AI-generated development plan
├── catalog-info.yaml            # Backstage component registration
├── README.md                    # Project documentation
├── docker-compose.yml           # Local development setup
├── .github/workflows/           # GitHub Actions
│   ├── ci.yml                   # Continuous integration
│   └── deploy.yml               # Deployment pipeline
├── backend/                     # Node.js backend
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── controllers/         # API controllers
│   │   ├── models/              # Data models
│   │   ├── routes/              # API routes
│   │   ├── middleware/          # Custom middleware
│   │   ├── config/              # Configuration
│   │   └── server.js            # Server entry point
│   ├── tests/                   # Backend tests
│   ├── package.json
│   └── Dockerfile
├── frontend/                    # React frontend
│   ├── src/
│   │   ├── components/          # React components
│   │   ├── pages/               # Page components
│   │   ├── hooks/               # Custom hooks
│   │   ├── utils/               # Utilities
│   │   ├── styles/              # CSS/Tailwind
│   │   └── App.jsx              # App entry point
│   ├── public/                  # Static assets
│   ├── tests/                   # Frontend tests
│   ├── package.json
│   └── Dockerfile
└── aws/                         # AWS infrastructure
    ├── cloudformation/          # CloudFormation templates
    ├── scripts/                 # Deployment scripts
    └── infrastructure.yml       # Infrastructure as code
```

## Template Parameters

### Required Parameters

- **Project Name**: `my-todo-app` (lowercase, hyphens)
- **Description**: Brief project description
- **Repository Location**: GitHub repository URL

### Optional Parameters

- **Feature Type**: `feature`, `bugfix`, or `refactoring`
- **Feature Description**: Detailed description for AI planning

## Template Configuration

### Template Definition

The template is defined in `template.yaml`:

```yaml
apiVersion: scaffolding.backstage.io/v1beta3
kind: Template
metadata:
  name: golden-path-todo
  title: Golden Path Fullstack Todo
  description: Fullstack todo application with AI-generated implementation plan
spec:
  type: service
  parameters:
    - title: Project Information
      required: ['name', 'description', 'repoUrl']
      properties:
        name:
          title: Project Name
          type: string
          pattern: '^[a-z][a-z0-9-]*$'
          description: Lowercase, alphanumeric with hyphens
        description:
          title: Description
          type: string
          description: Brief project description
        repoUrl:
          title: Repository Location
          type: string
          ui:field: RepoUrlPicker
          ui:options:
            allowedHosts:
              - github.com
```

### Template Steps

<Steps>
  <Step title="Fetch Base Template">
    Downloads the base template structure and files
  </Step>
  <Step title="Generate AI Plan">
    Calls Traycer AI to generate implementation guide
  </Step>
  <Step title="Create Implementation Guide">
    Writes detailed development plan as IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md
  </Step>
  <Step title="Publish to GitHub">
    Creates repository and pushes all files
  </Step>
  <Step title="Register Component">
    Adds component to Backstage catalog
  </Step>
</Steps>

## AI Implementation Plans

Each template generates an AI-powered implementation plan that includes:

### Plan Structure

```markdown
# Development Plan for {project-name}

## Project Context
- Template: Golden Path fullstack-todo
- Tech Stack: React 18 + Node.js + MongoDB + AWS

## Feature Description
{User-provided feature description}

## Specification Reference
{Technical specifications from Traycer}

## Implementation Plan
{Detailed step-by-step implementation guide}

## Golden Path Compliance Checklist

### Backend Implementation
- [ ] Follow RESTful conventions
- [ ] Use authentication patterns
- [ ] Implement error handling
- [ ] Add input validation
- [ ] Add comprehensive testing

### Frontend Implementation
- [ ] Follow component patterns
- [ ] Use Tailwind CSS for styling
- [ ] Implement proper state management
- [ ] Add loading and error states
- [ ] Ensure responsive design

### Testing Requirements
- [ ] Unit tests for all functions
- [ ] Integration tests for API endpoints
- [ ] E2E tests for user flows
- [ ] Performance tests for critical paths

### Documentation
- [ ] Update API documentation
- [ ] Add component documentation
- [ ] Update architecture diagrams
- [ ] Create deployment guides
```

### Feature Type Templates

Different feature types generate specialized plans:

<AccordionGroup>
<Accordion title="Feature Templates">
Focus on new functionality:
- User interface components
- API endpoints
- Database schema changes
- Integration patterns
</Accordion>

<Accordion title="Bugfix Templates">
Focus on resolving issues:
- Root cause analysis
- Fix implementation
- Regression testing
- Documentation updates
</Accordion>

<Accordion title="Refactoring Templates">
Focus on code improvement:
- Code restructuring
- Performance optimization
- Technical debt reduction
- Modernization updates
</Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>

## Using Templates

### Step-by-Step Guide

<Steps>
  <Step title="Access Template">
    Go to http://localhost:3000/create
  </Step>
  <Step title="Select Template">
    Choose "Golden Path Fullstack Todo"
  </Step>
  <Step title="Fill Parameters">
    Complete the form with project details
  </Step>
  <Step title="Execute Template">
    Click "Create" to generate project
  </Step>
  <Step title="Monitor Progress">
    Track template execution progress
  </Step>
  <Step title="Clone Generated Project">
    Clone the newly created repository
  </Step>
  <Step title="Follow Implementation Guide">
    Use the generated IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md
  </Step>
</Steps>

### Template Best Practices

<Warning>
Always review the generated implementation guide before starting development.
</Warning>

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card title="Parameter Validation">
    • Use descriptive project names
    • Provide clear descriptions
    • Ensure repository URLs are correct
    • Review all parameters before execution
  </Card>
  <Card title="After Generation">
    • Clone the repository immediately
    • Read the implementation guide
    • Set up local development
    • Follow the compliance checklist
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## Custom Templates

### Creating Custom Templates

1. **Create Template Directory**
   ```bash
   mkdir examples/template/my-custom-template
   cd examples/template/my-custom-template
   ```

2. **Define Template**
   Create `template.yaml` with metadata and parameters

3. **Add Skeleton Files**
   Create base project structure in `skeleton/`

4. **Test Template**
   Use Backstage UI to test template functionality

### Template Directory Structure

```
my-custom-template/
├── template.yaml              # Template definition
├── skeleton/                  # Base project files
│   ├── package.json
│   ├── README.md
│   ├── src/
│   └── config/
└── content/                   # Generated content
    └── catalog-info.yaml
```

### Template Configuration

```yaml
apiVersion: scaffolding.backstage.io/v1beta3
kind: Template
metadata:
  name: my-custom-template
  title: My Custom Template
  description: Custom template for our organization
spec:
  type: service
  parameters:
    - title: Project Information
      required: ['name', 'owner']
      properties:
        name:
          title: Project Name
          type: string
          pattern: '^[a-z][a-z0-9-]*$'
        owner:
          title: Owner
          type: string
          description: Team or individual responsible
  steps:
    - id: fetch-base
      action: fetch:template
      input:
        url: ./skeleton

    - id: publish-github
      action: publish:github
      input:
        repoUrl: ${{ parameters.repoUrl }}
```

## Template Actions

### Built-in Actions

- **fetch:template**: Download template skeleton
- **fetch:plain**: Download plain files
- **publish:github**: Create GitHub repository
- **catalog:register**: Register in Backstage catalog

### Custom Actions

The template includes custom Traycer integration:

```typescript
// packages/backend/src/plugins/scaffolder/actions/traycer-integration.ts
export const traycerGeneratePlanAction = () => ({
  action: 'traycer:generate-plan',
  handler: async (ctx) => {
    // Generate AI implementation plan
    const plan = await generateImplementationPlan(
      ctx.input.spec,
      ctx.input.featureDescription
    );

    // Write implementation guide
    await ctx.output('implementationGuide', plan);
  }
});
```

## Template Examples

### Microservice Template

```yaml
metadata:
  name: microservice-template
  title: Microservice Template
spec:
  parameters:
    - title: Service Configuration
      properties:
        serviceName:
          title: Service Name
          type: string
        port:
          title: Service Port
          type: number
          default: 3000
        database:
          title: Database Type
          enum: [postgresql, mongodb, none]
```

### Frontend Component Template

```yaml
metadata:
  name: component-template
  title: React Component Template
spec:
  parameters:
    - title: Component Information
      properties:
        componentName:
          title: Component Name
          type: string
        componentType:
          title: Component Type
          enum: [page, layout, ui, form]
        withTests:
          title: Include Tests
          type: boolean
          default: true
```

## Troubleshooting

<AccordionGroup>
<Accordion title="Template Execution Fails">
**Common Issues**:
- Invalid template YAML syntax
- Missing required parameters
- Network connectivity issues
- GitHub authentication problems

**Solutions**:
- Validate YAML syntax
- Check parameter requirements
- Verify network connection
- Confirm GitHub token permissions
</Accordion>

<Accordion title="Generated Project Issues">
**Common Issues**:
- Invalid file permissions
- Missing dependencies
- Configuration errors
- Build failures

**Solutions**:
- Check file permissions
- Run `npm install` or `yarn install`
- Verify configuration files
- Review build logs
</Accordion>

<Accordion title="AI Plan Generation Fails">
**Common Issues**:
- Traycer API unavailable
- Invalid feature specifications
- Network timeouts

**Solutions**:
- Check API connectivity
- Verify feature descriptions
- Try manual plan generation
- Use fallback local generation
</Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>
